info.author: Dave Haynes
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: Apache Software License
info.description:
*Indigestion* employs SQLite_ to provide offline processing of structured
        data, and generation of graphical reports.
        
        You can use it for:
        
            * Data quality measurement
            * Business rule checking
            * Data cleaning
            * Data migration
        
        *Indigestion* is primarily developed for use with Openstack_
        deployments, but the command-line tools are designed to allow easy
        customisation.
        
        With moderate effort, you should be able to generate a
        data survey against your own application.
        
        *Indigestion* has a well-tested string validation module. An online
        application can use it to filter user input. An example is included
        in the source distribution.
        
        ..  _SQLite: http://www.sqlite.org
        ..  _Openstack: http://www.openstack.org/
info.name: indigestion
info.html_description:
Indigestion employs SQLite to provide offline processing of structured

data, and generation of graphical reports.

You can use it for:

  • Data quality measurement
  • Business rule checking
  • Data cleaning
  • Data migration

Indigestion is primarily developed for use with Openstack deployments, but the command-line tools are designed to allow easy customisation.

With moderate effort, you should be able to generate a data survey against your own application.

Indigestion has a well-tested string validation module. An online application can use it to filter user input. An example is included in the source distribution.
